description: I am better known for my performative installations using robotic agents as stylized actors that make marks and for my exploration of the drawing practice. My work has been exhibited in solo and group shows, including in association with major museums such as; The Pompidou Center (Paris), Prada Foundation (Milan), Tate Modern (London), V&A, MMCA (Seoul), Grand Palais (Paris), BOZAR (Brussels), TAM (Beijing), Mcam (Shanghai), Mori Museum (Tokyo), Artistree (Hong Kong).
